sentences.sContent: Such political communities are characterized by heterogeneity and difference with no shared object of design.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such political communities are characterized by heterogeneity and difference with no shared object of design.
sentences.sCn: 这样的政治共同体的特征是不会共享别人的设计的异质性和区别。

synos.tran: [生物]异质性；[物][矿业][化学]不均匀性；多相性

words.tran: [化学] 多相的；异种的；[化学] 不均匀的；由不同成分形成的
异质的；[生物] 异源的；异种的

trans.tranCn: 异种， 异质， 不同成分
